name: Ladder Guy
description:

Track your high score!
On Kongregate

Ladder Guy

Conquer as many castles as you can with Ladder Guy!

How far can you go?

How to Play:

Hold to extend the ladder

Release to raise the ladder

Make sure your ladder is long enough for Ladder Guy to get into the castle

But careful! If its too long, your foe will push the ladder down!
